lead_paragraph: Angela Park shot a five-under 67 yesterday at LPGA International in Daytona Beach, Fla., for a share of the second-round lead with Hye Jung Choi of South Korea in the L.P.G.A. Tour’s 90-hole final qualifying tournament. Park, from Torrance, Calif., had six birdies on the Legends Course to match Choi at seven-under 137. Park, 18, turned professional in April.
